title: Remove Chars box
extract: Delete text before or after character by Find and Replace in ExcelPress Ctrl + F to open the Find and Replace dialog, and click Replace tab, and type *, into the Find what text box, and leave blank in the Replace with text box, then click Replace All. ... Notes:More items...
extract_html:
Delete text before or after character by Find and Replace in Excel
  1. Press Ctrl + F to open the Find and Replace dialog, and click Replace tab, and type *, into the Find what text box, and leave blank in the Replace with text box, then click Replace All. ...
  2. Notes:
More items...
